rule: $.resource[*].aws_db_event_subscription[*].*[*].source_type exists and $.resource[*].aws_db_event_subscription[*].*[*].source_type equals db-security-group and ($.resource[*].aws_db_event_subscription[*].*[*].enabled exists and $.resource[*].aws_db_event_subscription[*].*[*].enabled is false )
policy: AWS RDS event subscription disabled for DB security groups
